content.question: A. Describe the map scale shown in Image 2. B. Explain how the land use practice shown in Image 1 has altered the physical features of the landscape. C. Explain a likely effect of terracing on soil quality. D. Explain the degree to which mechanized irrigation may affect food insecurity in developing countries. E. Explain how government policies may impact the incomes of commercial farmers.

frqParts.text: A. Describe the map scale shown in Image 2. B. Explain how the land use practice shown in Image 1 has altered the physical features of the landscape. C. unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
